meanings.definition: A person or thing that stylizes.
meanings.sent1: The artist was known as a talented stylisers in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new set of stylisers to decorate her room.
meanings.sent3: The stylisers at the party made everyone laugh with their unique outfits.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a set of magical stylisers, transforming everything she touched.
meanings.sent5: The stylisers in the movie set design team brought the story to life with their imaginative touch.

meanings.definition: A substance or device used to add style or flair to something.
meanings.sent1: The hair gel acted as the perfect stylisers for his wild hairstyle.
meanings.sent2: She used decorative stylisers to enhance the look of her scrapbook.
meanings.sent3: The quirky stylisers in the kitchen drawer always made cooking more fun.
meanings.sent4: The colorful paint was like magical stylisers, transforming the plain walls into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer's collection of stylisers included unique buttons and ribbons for a touch of elegance.
